entities.name: snape
entities.description: A teacher at Hogwarts, referred to as 'he' or 'Snape'. He shouts 'POTTER!' which makes Harry stop and look around.

relationships.description: Harry is trying to get to Dumbledore's office, as indicated by his actions and thoughts throughout the passage.
Snape interrupts Harry's attempt to reach Dumbledore's office by shouting 'POTTER!' which makes Harry stop and look around.
